translations: n.辊型设计；中凹度磨削；弧线，弧形化
v.成弧形；起拱（camber 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: According to real tested data, it builds up CVC cambering curve equation by polynomial regression. This paper discusses practical significance of the equation.
sentences.translation: 根据实测数据，采用多项式回归方法，建立CVC辊形曲线方程，并探讨了该方程的重要实际意义。

sentences.sentence: This paper discusses the question of crane main girder camber and the pre-cambering curve, introducing camber values stipulated in related crane standards in China and abroad.
sentences.translation: 本文论述起重机主梁的上拱度及预拱曲线的基本原理，介绍了国内外起重机技术标准中规定的上拱度值。
